headline: Is Best Buy Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: Understanding Best Buy's Recent Share Price Performance Before we dig into what Best Buy might actually be worth, it helps to understand how the share price has been behaving and what that tells us about the market's expectations. Over the past week, Best Buy's share price has slipped around 1.0%, extending a roughly 5.5% decline over the last month. Year to date the stock is down about 14.7%, and over the last 12 months it has fallen approximately 11.8%, even though its 3 year return is...
